snippet: On Friday, a new law took effect that allows Texans with permits to carry concealed weapons to openly carry those weapons.

byline.original: By MANNY FERNANDEZ and DAVID MONTGOMERY
byline.contributor: Manny Fernandez reported from Houston, and David Montgomery from Austin, Tex.

lead_paragraph: On Friday, a new law took effect that allows Texans with permits to carry concealed weapons to openly carry those weapons.
abstract: Open-carry law just passed in Texas allows certain residents to wear their handguns in holsters; bill triggers long-simmering debate over Texas' gun culture with supporters saying law will deter criminals and opponents countering that there is no evidence that open-carry states are safer.

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Moms Demand Action for Gun Sense in America

headline.print_headline: Texas Becomes Gun-Friendlier With New Law
headline.main: Gun-Friendly Texas Is Getting Even Friendlier
